mute-desc: Temporarily mute a player in global chat. Usage: /mute player 1d 20h 45m
mute-error-duration: Invalid duration format. Use: 1d (days), 20h (hours), 45m (minutes). Max: 365d, 24h, 60m. Example: /mute player 1d 20h 45m
mute-error-toolong: Mute duration cannot exceed {0} minutes (approximately 1 year)
mute-notify: You are forbidden to write in global chat for {0}
mute-notify-duration: You are forbidden to write in global chat for {0}
mute-notify-minutes: You are forbidden to write in global chat for {0} minutes
mute-success: Player '{0}' was muted in global chat for {1}
unmute-notify: You can write in global chat again
mutelist-empty: No one is muted at the moment
findplayer-error: [ChatMute] Failed to get player data by name '{0}': {1}
